/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/KAFKA.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/KAFKA.dir/ThreadPool.cpp.o -o KAFKA   -L/root/kafka-cpp-getting-started/app_kafka_library  -Wl,-rpath,/root/kafka-cpp-getting-started/app_kafka_library:/root/kafka-cpp-getting-started/build/app_kafka_library/src app_kafka_library/src/libapp_kafka_library.so -lrdkafka++
